reviews.review: Its good for a certain few. Its really fun idea but the bugs and mechanics are really unpolished. I am red rank so I do think my opinion is somewhat valid, I do think the game is fun, but there a lot of flaws.
Game is too hard. Friends said that they'd carry me but they'd always die before me and didnt do shit with the gens.

sucks now

edited: still sucks

edit on 08/20/21: still pretty bad

edit on 09/06/21: still not good

edit on 06/22/22: i do not like the game yet

Watching streamers play DBD: "lol this game looks ez"
Playing as survivors: "wtf I can't outrun the killer at all wtf WTF"
Playing as killers: "wtf I can't find anyone, let alone hook them or kill them wtf WTF"

Played a few rounds. Got stabbed, punched, choked and had a really nice time.

The newest update (Hellraiser chapter), as always, broke more of the functional parts of the game than fixing any of the well known bugs. A friend of mine hit an already injured survivor who slid over a pallet and got both screaming and blood effects. What he did not get was the luxory of a downed survivor, who remained injured but on his feet. A couple seconds later, said survivor was downed several feet away from the exit, but couldn't be picked up and slithered away. Playing as or against Pinhead breaks the game completely, evidenced by me experiencing a killer disconnecting from the game as well as watching my friend get a disconnect as Pinhead while having a stable connection to Discord.

"The Game" still has unbreakable pallets, and as a survivor you can't cleanse totems on several instances of Coldwind Farm and Backwater Swamp.

Think again before drowning Behaviour in your hard earned money. 

Thx xoxo in advance.
this game will give you many incurable diseases, and you should play it.
bem legal a dinamica do game , me lembra de quando brincava de policia e ladrao quando crianca

Hi i really recommend this game if you are into survival or killing game's just to sum up the game you can pick survivor or killer (btw you can always change)If you pick survivor you have to complete 5 generator's with you're three other teammates but there is a killer who will prevent you from completing the generators and there are multiple killer's with different ability's like a killer that can throw hatchet's a killer who can be invisible...etc there are also license caracters like Freddy Kruger,Nemesis from Resident Evil...etc and there are also different survivors who have different perks (ability's?)like a perk who will give you a speed boost a perk who will give you the ability to heal without a med-kit.You can also go on Youtube and type dead by daylight and you will find a lot of people who play the game for more information Good Luck and i hope you enjoy the game!
And you will hate  this game and love it (you will understand after 200h)
Great game, not for the faint hearted.

If your new to the game you can expect one of the most toxic communities to any game and devs, who take a sh*t on the heads of their players on a regular bases. Enjoy!

OK.. Je suis tr√®s partag√© sur ce jeu. En lui-m√™me il est bien fichu, sympa √† jouer et le principe addictif. Les tueurs ont une vraie personnalit√©, des comp√©tences qui varient et le principe des survivants est sympathique ( surtout entre amis ). 
Les comp√©tences font office de progression et on a envie de perfectionner son style de jeu et une partie √©quilibr√©e entre joueurs fairplay est vraiment tr√®s fun.

MAIS !!! Nouveaux acheteurs attention !!! Deux choses √† savoir et importantes :

- La moiti√© de la communaut√© est compos√© de cr√©tins de quatorze ans se sentant pousser un ego d√©mesur√© d√®s qu'ils r√©ussissent √† bien jouer et feront tout pour vous pourrir la vie : survivants, qui provoquent le tueur intentionnellement, exploitent les m√©caniques du jeu et peuvent communiquer entre eux pour maximiser leur chiantise, tueurs qui campent ou focus un seul survivant...

- Le matchmaking est extr√™mement in√©gal au profit de parties trouv√©es relativement rapidement. Ainsi vous serez de plus en plus confront√© √† des joueurs jouant depuis quatre ans et de 10 rangs sur 20 vos sup√©rieurs et ce toutes les parties. A titre d'exemple, jouant depuis trois mois, je ne passe plus une partie sans tomber sur 2 √† 4 joueurs de ce type et qui sont rarement les plus fairplay ( voir point ci-dessus ).

Cela fait 150 heures que je joue √† ce jeu et 50 que je ne m'amuse plus du fait de ces deux points venant pourrir CHAQUE FOUTUE PARTIE.

En conclusion, si vous √™tes ma√Ætre zen ou tr√®s dou√©, foncez. Le jeu est bon en lui-m√™me. Mais si vous √™tes facilement contrari√© par le jeu ou √©nerv√© par les autres, passez votre chemin. 

Ni les joueurs ni le jeu ne vous feront de cadeaux et ce n'est pas l'√©quipe de d√©vs qui apportera ni une am√©lioration du matchmaking ni une remontrance aux √©l√©ments toxiques de la communaut√©.

Played this after one of my friends suggested it to play together. Normally I'm an absolute baby when it comes to horror, but this is a game that I can routinely load up and just play around in by myself now. It is much more fun if you have a friend in a call with you as it can increase your odds of survival but its not a necessity to win

There's times where it can be a little buggy (one of our friends routinely gets kicked from the party after each match) but other than that it seems fine
